author: thomas
text:
553 U. S. ____ (2008)553 U. S. ____ (2008)553 U. S. ____ (2008)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 07-455UNITED STATES, PETITIONERv.AHMED
RESSAMon writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the ninth circuit[May 19, 2008]Justice Thomas, with whom Justice
Scalia joins, concurring in part and concurring in the
judgment.Because the plain language of the
statute squarely answers the question presented in this case, I
join only Part I of the Court’s opinion.
